info.author: Rangoli Saxena
info.description: ## mapfost mapfost is a python implementation of the autofocus method MAPFoST introduced in the publication Binding J, Mikula S, Denk W. Low-dosage Maximum-A-Posteriori Focusing and Stigmation. Microsc Microanal. 2013 ## Installation Use the package manager pip to install mapfost ```bash pip install mapfost ``` ## Usage ```python import mapfost as mf res = mf.est_aberr([test_im1, test_im2]) ``` ## Example run the script run_sample.py ```python mf.test_installation() ``` Expected output is a scipy.optimize.minimize object (as shown below).\ The x key in the following object is the estimated aberration vector. ```python hess_inv: <3x3 LbfgsInvHessProduct with dtype=float64> jac: array([ 195312.50118701, -195312.50118701, 390624.9980372 ]) message: 'CONVERGENCE: REL_REDUCTION_OF_F_<=_FACTR*EPSMCH' nfev: 24 nit: 5 njev: 6 status: 0 success: True x: array([-1.10622, -1.31151, 0.58894]) ...Installation Test Successful... [-1.10622 -1.31151 0.58894] ``` ## License [MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
info.name: mapfost
info.summary: Implementation of the autofocus method MAPFoSt. Publication: Binding J, Mikula S, Denk W. Low-dosage Maximum-A-Posteriori Focusing and Stigmation. Microsc Microanal. 2013
